L2_gloss: The first letter of the Lezgi alphabet, written in the Cyrillic script.
Bratislava (the capital and largest city of Slovakia)
old rag[3], Synonym: пек (pek), (in the plural) cork,
herd (of cattle)[3], нехирдик хьун ― neχirdik xun ―
From Proto-Lezghian *jirḳʷ. Akin to Budukh йыкӏ (jɨḳ).,
The 36th and the last letter of the Lezgi Arabic script. Its preceded by ژ
